rooms.description: Spacious living area with floor-to-ceiling windows that allow ample natural light and views of the garden, following Vastu principles for relaxation.
Private master bedroom positioned in the southwest corner as per Chettinad style aesthetics and Vastu guidelines.
Small guest room providing additional space; integrated with overall floor plan for harmonious design.
Essential bathroom attached to the master bedroom for convenience and privacy.

openings.description: Traditional Chettinad style front entrance complemented with robust design elements.
Large two-car garage door that leads to the driveway and garden, following local building norms and Vastu principles for positive energy flow.

facade.description: The bungalow's facade is designed with a mix of modern and traditional Chettinad elements, featuring decorative columns, intricate woodwork, and expansive floor-to-ceiling windows that invite natural light throughout the property.

rooms.description: Dedicated two-car garage with ample space for vehicles and storage; designed to integrate seamlessly with the bungalow's layout.

openings.description: Access point leading from the exterior driveway into the garage area.

facade.description: The facade of the garage is designed to complement the bungalow and garden environment while ensuring functionality and ease of access.
